title: FREE DD-WRT HOTSPOT ADDON WITH WEBLOGIN UPDATED
description:
CONVERT YOUR NORMAL DD-WRT COMPATIBLE ROUTER IN A SERIOUS HOTSPOT SERVER WITH WEB LOGIN AND USER DATABASE SUPPORT!!

JUST FOR SOME ROUTERS MODELS:
ASUS, BUFFALO, BELKIN, D-LINK, LINKSYS, MICROSOFT, NETGEAR, SIEMENS!!!

WHY LOCKING YOUR NETWORK? IF YOUR NETWORK IS LOCKED/PROTECTED NOBODY WOULD KNOW THAT YOU ARE SELLING-SHARING-ETC. IT!
INSTEAD OF THAT TRY WEB LOGIN PAGE WITH USER DATABASE WITHOUT ANY ADDITIONAL SERVERS. ROUTER HANDLES  EVERYTHING. YOUR ROUTER HANDLES EVERYTHING!!!
SO WHY USING PC, SERVERS AND OTHER EQUIPMENT IF U COULD RUN YOUR OWN PROFESSIONAL HOTSPOT ON YOUR ROUTER???
WHAT ARE BENEFITS OF RUNNING SPECIAL FIRMWARE?
SIMPLE WEB LOGIN FOR UN EXPERIENCED USERS
GOOD COMMERCIAL FOR HOTSPOT
YOU GET YOUR LOGO INTEGRATED IN LOGIN PAGE
USER DATABASE (CREATE, DELETE ACCOUNT...)
NETWORK SEEMS OPEN (BUT ITS NOT-LOGIN PAGE)
YOU CAN CHOOSE REDIRECTION PAGE AFTER LOGIN
TIME WHEN LOGIN EXPIRES AND FREQUENCY WHEN IT SHOWS AGAIN
QOS - YOU COULD MANAGE BANDWIDTH
LOW RUNNING COSTS
LESS ELECTRICITY
OUTPUT POWER UP TO 250mW


FAQ?

1)COULD I USE IT WITH DIFFERENT DD-WRT VERSION?
OF COURSE. 
WITHOUT ANY MODIFICATIONS IT WORKS WITH :
DD-WRT V23SP2 SPECIAL EDITION
DD-WRT V23SP2 NOKAID
DD-WRT V23SP3 NOKAID
DD-WRT V24 NOKAID
V23SP3 SPECIAL EDITION
FOR OTHER VERSION TO WORK YOU MUST PERFORM SD-CARD MOD.

2)HOW DO I PERFORM SD-CARD MOD?
DESCRIBED HERE: <a href="
http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/SD/MMC_mod" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/SD/MMC_mod</a>
AFTER THAT YOU COULD USE ANY VERSION YOU WANT.

3)HOW COULD I CHANGE LOGIN PICTURE WITH MY COMPANY LOGO?
IN FOLDER COPY TO ROUTER YOU GOT PICTURE NAMED "dostop.jpg".
OPEN IT IN EDITOR AND ADD TEXT YOUR LOGO AND SAVE IT.
